title: 43. Celebrity Esthetician JoElle Lee on Treating Multicultural Skin, Finessing your Extractions, and the Importance of Finding Your NICHE
description:
Hi Treatment Roomies!! In this episode we are talking with JoElle Lee - Michelle Obama's personal esthetician who has been in the space for 20 years and boasts accomplishments such as starting her own skincare line, writing two best selling books, and starting her own education program for esties. We talk with her about her specialities that include treating multicultural skin and working with chemical peels. We discuss finding your niche, and why you SHOULDN'T rent your own suite straight out of estie school.

JoElle's information:

Her Books Here

www.joelleskincare.com & www.joellelee.com

IG @joellelee_estheticstraining

FB Group https://www.facebook.com/groups/705749119851571/

Educate, Donate, Participate for Justice:

https://blacklivesmatter.com

https://www.standwithbre.com

Lauren's Instagram: @laurens.esthetics + Lauren's Blog www.lauren-kruger.com

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa.dermaplus

Tess' TikTok @myestytessa.dermaplus

Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly

Music by LiQwYd

--- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/the-treatment-room/support
